title: The Curious Caterpillar
hook: Why did Coco the caterpillar decide to explore the unknown forest all alone?
moral: Curiosity can bring new adventures and friends, but always stay cautious and ask for help.
paragraphs: Once upon a time in a colorful forest, lived a curious caterpillar named Coco. She loved to explore new places and meet new friends.
One sunny day, Coco decided to wander deep into the unknown part of the forest. Excited and a bit scared, she ventured further away from her cozy home.
Suddenly, Coco found herself surrounded by tall trees and strange sounds. "Oh no, I'm lost," she whispered, feeling a bit frightened.
Just then, a friendly squirrel named Sammy appeared. "Hello, little caterpillar! Can I help you find your way back home?" Sammy offered with a warm smile.
Coco gratefully accepted Sammy's help, and together they journeyed back to Coco's home. Along the way, they shared stories and laughter, becoming fast friends.
From that day on, Coco learned that while exploring is exciting, it's always important to have a friend by your side and ask for help when needed.

en-pt.hook: Por que Coco, a lagarta, decidiu explorar a floresta desconhecida sozinha?
en-pt.moral: A curiosidade pode trazer novas aventuras e amigos, mas sempre fique atento e peça ajuda.
en-pt.title: A Lagartinha Curiosa
paragraphs:
Era uma vez, em uma floresta colorida, morava uma lagarta curiosa chamada Coco. Ela adorava explorar novos lugares e conhecer novos amigos.
Certa manhã ensolarada, Coco decidiu passear bem fundo na parte desconhecida da floresta. Animada e um pouco assustada, ela se aventurou mais longe de sua casa aconchegante.
De repente, Coco se viu cercada por árvores altas e por barulhos estranhos. "Ai não, estou perdida," ela sussurrou, se sentindo um pouco assustada.
Em um instante, um esquilo amigável chamado Sammy apareceu. "Olá, pequena lagarta! Posso te ajudar a encontrar seu caminho de volta para casa?" Sammy ofereceu com um sorriso caloroso.
Coco agradeceu muito a ajuda de Sammy e juntos voltaram para a casa de Coco. No caminho, eles compartilharam histórias e risadas, se tornando amigos rapidamente.
A partir desse dia, o Coco aprendeu que, embora seja empolgante explorar, é sempre importante ter um amigo ao seu lado e pedir ajuda quando necessário.

en-fr.title: La Chenille Curieuse
en-fr.hook: Pourquoi Coco la chenille a-t-elle décidé d'explorer seule la forêt inconnue?
en-fr.moral: La curiosité peut amener de nouvelles aventures et des amis, mais reste toujours prudent et demande de l'aide.
paragraphs:
Il était une fois, dans une forêt colorée, habitait une chenille curieuse nommée Coco. Elle aimait explorer des endroits nouveaux et rencontrer de nouveaux amis.
Il était une fois, un jour ensoleillé, Coco a décidé de s'aventurer profondément dans la partie inconnue de la forêt. Excitée et un peu effrayée, elle s'est aventurée de plus en plus loin de sa maison douillette.
Soudain, Coco se retrouva entourée de grands arbres et de sons étranges. "Oh non, je suis perdue," murmura-t-elle, se sentant un peu effrayée.
Tout à coup, un gentil écureuil nommé Sammy est apparu. "Bonjour, petite chenille! Puis-je t'aider à retrouver ton chemin vers la maison?" Sammy a offert avec un sourire chaleureux.
Coco a joyeusement accepté l'aide de Sammy, et ensemble, ils sont rentrés chez Coco. En chemin, ils ont partagé des histoires et des rires, devenant de véritables amis.
Depuis ce jour-là, Coco a appris que l'exploration est amusante mais c'est toujours important d'avoir un ami à ses côtés et de demander de l'aide quand nécessaire.

en-de.title: Die Neugierige Raupe
en-de.hook: Warum entschied sich Coco die Raupe, den unbekannten Wald ganz alleine zu erkunden?
en-de.moral: Neugier kann neue Abenteuer und Freunde bringen, aber immer vorsichtig bleiben und um Hilfe bitten.
paragraphs:
Es war einmal in einem bunten Wald, lebte eine neugierige Raupe namens Coco. Sie liebte es, neue Orte zu erkunden und neue Freunde kennenzulernen.
Eines sonnigen Tages beschloss Coco, tief in den unbekannten Teil des Waldes zu wandern. Aufgeregt und ein bisschen ängstlich, wagte sie sich weiter weg von ihrem gemütlichen Zuhause.
Plötzlich fand sich Coco zwischen hohen Bäumen und seltsamen Geräuschen wieder. "Oh nein, ich bin verloren", flüsterte sie und fühlte sich ein bisschen verängstigt.
Gerade in diesem Moment erschien ein freundliches Eichhörnchen namens Sammy. "Hallo, kleine Raupe! Kann ich dir helfen, deinen Weg zurück nach Hause zu finden?" Sammy bot mit einem warmen Lächeln an.
Coco nahm Sammys Hilfe dankbar an und zusammen machten sie sich auf den Weg zurück zu Cocos Zuhause. Unterwegs teilten sie Geschichten und Gelächter, und wurden schnelle Freunde.
Seit diesem Tag hat Coco gelernt, dass es zwar aufregend ist zu erforschen, aber es immer wichtig ist, einen Freund an seiner Seite zu haben und um Hilfe zu bitten, wenn man sie braucht.

id-en.hook: Why did Coco the caterpillar decide to explore the unknown forest all alone?
id-en.moral: Curiosity can bring new adventures and friends, but always stay cautious and ask for help.
id-en.title: The Curious Caterpillar
paragraphs:
Long time ago in a forest with many colors, there was a very curious caterpillar named Coco. Coco liked to discover new places and make new friends.
One sunny day, Coco decided to walk into the deep, dark part of the forest where she had never been before. She was happy and a little afraid as she went far from her warm house.
One day, Coco was walking in the forest when she saw big trees and heard funny noises. 
"Oh my, I don't know where I am," she said quietly, feeling a little scared.
Once upon a time, a nice squirrel named Sammy showed up. "Hi there, little caterpillar! Do you need help getting back home?" Sammy asked kindly, with a happy face.
Coco happily said thank you to Sammy for helping her. They went together to Coco's house. On the road, they talked and laughed, and became good friends.
One day, Coco discovered that it's fun to explore new things, but it's good to have a friend with you and ask for help when you need it.
